content: Please add a last ten statistic for every game level, and maybe also a last 50 statistic for the same. Then, while I'm stating my druthers, the same two statistics for all levels of the game grouped together. Please add an automatic draw for X number of moves without a capture. On the lower levels the game won't prosecute the endgame well and this leads to a lot of worthless chasing. I usually wait until I've made 50 evading moves before calling it a draw. It would be good to be automatic.
Fun.
Best checkers game around. Highly recommended.
This is the best checkers app for Android from the 10+ that I tried and tested. I also find it the most aesthetically pleasing.
I enjoy playing.

July 9, 2020 - Forced stopped. Clear cache and storage. Uninstalled. Reinstalled. Open app. Sign in. Screen dims for 60 seconds. Google Play Games pop up and now I'm signed in. Access online multiplayer and it functional. Staying on this update for now. AI in single player mode doesn't 'think' as long as before so that's a plus but still puts up a good challenge.üëç ~ Pixel XL.
replyContent: We're sorry you're seeing a problem with the app again. Please make sure Google Play Games is up to date and look at Google Play Services as well, as this is also involved in running Multiplayer. Please contact support@aifactory.co.uk to help us understand what might be happening.

content: Mean game
Lots of fun and settings for easy or hard.
Great game with hints and more

like the game, I've had it for years. *I predict you'll say that you'll consider this for your to-do list and then not do anything about it, but a gripe of mine is - when playing on the higher/ highest levels, and auto capture is turned on, when the A.I. still has to 'think' (the little timer that appears) about its next/ best move, even if there's just a single capture to be made. there's literally nothing for it to 'think' about.
replyContent: Thank you for your suggestions. We have added these for consideration on our to-do list however we're a very small, very busy team so we can't say how long it might take to fully assess them.

content: Great deal of fun and thinking in this classic board game
Great game to pass the time
I love it.
The game works great, the A.I. is fantastic. But it would be nice if the application it's self had a screen always on setting.
replyContent: Thank you for your suggestion. We have added this for consideration on our to-do list.

content: Paid for several apps from this company because I like classic games...now, ever since they added that crappy "Google Licensing Check" BS, every single one of them tell me to go buy the games again. Leaving bad reviews on all the ones I bought until they're playable or I get a refund. Thanks!
replyContent: We're sorry you're seeing a problem with the app. As part of new Google anti-piracy features, you need to start the app with internet connection to check the licence and this is then remembered for 30 days. If this doesn't help, please contact support@aifactory.co.uk

content: Simple and effective game for wasting time casually.

I have played this app for years, exactly what I want from a checkers game. The difficulty settings are controllable. Low levels are easy, ive never been able to beat more than 6, it gives me something to aim for.
CPU skips som
I paid for the app and i still get ads!!!! how do i get my money back????
replyContent: The paid version has no ads and installs as a separate app. Please open "Checkers", not "Checkers Free". On first start-up it picks up stats from the free version if you have allowed stats recording in both apps. If you would like a refund instead, please send original order number to support@aifactory.co.uk

replyContent: The paid version has no ads but installs as a separate app. Please check that you are not opening the free app after buying the paid app. If you are still seeing problems, please contact support@aifactory.co.uk

content: I like it.  Good basic checkers, no issues.
I was never any good at checkers. This app will change that.
I thought it was a nice game until I tried paying it single player. The CPU cheats and has it to where you can only choose moves that benefits it. Very annoying.
replyContent: Our app follows the rules of Checkers properly and does not cheat. Please finish your current match and go to Main Menu, then Single Player to check that "Forced Captures" is set as you expected, or send screenshots to query to support@aifactory.co.uk

content: Would be a idea to have a composition option.  This is a excellent app.
Great
The game is OK, it would been better with more colors for the pieces and boards, and more country rules, like International, Canadian, England and so on.... Other than that, good game!
replyContent: Thank you for your suggestions. We have added these for consideration on our to-do list.

content: Nice selection of board and pieces. The functionality is smooth. Paid version avoids the distracting Ads. Would like to see an option to enable to pieces to be set-up at mid-game/end-game if possible thereby providing a scope to explore different outcomes. This option could be regarding as a kind of sand pit/training mode.  Great app nonetheless.
replyContent: Thank you for your suggestion. We have added this for consideration on our to-do list.

content: I wish you had more levels in the game customizations of boards and pieces I wish it had a clock just like in the game of chess in Checker tournaments they use a clock to play in tournaments
replyContent: Thank you for your suggestions. There are currently 12 levels, 12 boards and 6 piece sets, and we plan to add more in the future. We have added the idea of game timers for consideration on our to-do list.

content: Any chance of a board set-up option for practicing endings?

This game is visually attractive and moves smoothly.  The problem I have (as a casual checkers player) is that there are supposedly 10 levels of difficulty - with 10 being the hardest - but essentially the gap between 2 and 3 is the same as between 2 and 10.  I can dominate on level 2, but get eviscerated on 3.  Dozens of times.  Lol.  Planning to uninstall because it's not fun anymore.
replyContent: We apologise for your frustration. Levels have been calibrated against each other and other chess apps but different human play styles may find some cpu styles easier than others. Have you tried Hint(?) on the Menu to help bridge the difficulty gap?

content: Can't make a setting for taking a pieces going back. For a paid app that is non sense.
replyContent: The app currently uses standard US/UK rules: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/English_draughts but we will consider adding alternative rules.
